SELECT
FROM `t_question` WHERE del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1 ORDER BY read_count DESC, like_count DESC, collect_count DESC, comment_count DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size}

SELECT
FROM `t_question` WHERE del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1 AND title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY read_count DESC, like_count DESC, collect_count DESC, comment_count DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size}
SELECT count(*) FROM `t_question` WHERE del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1 AND title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT
FROM `t_question` WHERE del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1 AND title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size}

SELECT
FROM `t_question` WHERE del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1 AND recommend = 1 ORDER BY read_count DESC, like_count DESC, collect_count DESC, comment_count DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size}
SELECT count(*) FROM `t_question` WHERE del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1 AND recommend = 1 AND title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT
FROM t_question WHERE id IN (SELECT question_id FROM t_question_tag WHERE tag_id = #{tagid}) AND del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1 ORDER BY sort DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_question WHERE id IN (SELECT question_id FROM t_question_tag WHERE tag_id = #{tagid}) AND del_flag = 0 AND is_public = 1

SELECT id, user_id, title, content, allow_comment, recommend, read_count, like_count, collect_count, comment_count, meet_count, difficulty, tags, publish_time FROM t_question WHERE is_public = 1 AND del_flag = 0 AND id=#{id}
